document_title: Cosmetic (silicon) breast implant rupture: causes, signs and treatment
subsection_content:
Rupture of silicone breast implants can cause breast pain or changes in the contour or shape of the breast. However, ruptured silicone breast implants do not cause breast cancer, nor do they cause fertility problems or connective tissue diseases such as rheumatoid arthritis.
When silicone implants rupture, it is often silent and may go unnoticed because the silicone tends to become trapped in the surrounding breast tissue. This is called subcapsular rupture or asymptomatic silent rupture.
However, surrounding breast tissue may become irritated and swollen. Fibrodermal scar tissue may also form.
subsection_title: vo tui nguc.json. Complications of breast implant rupture (silicon)
